posts.post_title: Updated - 10 different N172 Old Judge SGC
posts.post_content:
I have the following 10 SGC graded N172 Old Judge cards available for trade.  

I'm trading for other Old Judges that I need, MUST be PSA graded.

Bill Daley #111-1 SGC 1.5 (Boston)
Dell Darling #117-4 SGC 4 (Chicago)
Jerry Denny #124-1 SGC 2.5 (Indianapolis)
Mike Dorgan #132-14 SGC 1.5 (New York)
Jay Faatz #150-3 SGC 1.5 (Cleveland)
Jim Fogarty #165-2 SGC 2.5 (Philadelphia)
Gus Krock #270-5 SGC 3 (Chicago)
EL Mills #326-1 SGC 1 (Milwaukee)
Cannonball Stemmeyer #437-4 SGC 2 (Boston)

TRADED - [STRIKE]Cannonball Titcomb #458-1 SGC 2 (New York)[/STRIKE]
